nodes.description: Daallo Airlines客机起飞后不久发生爆炸和火灾，导致机身出现大洞
nodes.support_text: An explosion and fire blew a gaping hole in a commercial airliner, forcing it to make an emergency landing at Mogadishu's international airport late Tuesday, officials and witnesses said.

nodes.description: 飞行员称疑似炸弹爆炸，并成功操作返航降落
nodes.support_text: I think it was a bomb,

nodes.description: 15英里外发现15英里外坠落的严重烧伤老人遗体
nodes.support_text: Eyewitnesses claim the badly burned body of an elderly man fell to earth about 15 miles away from Mogadishu airport.

nodes.description: 74名乘客和机组人员被安全疏散，2人轻微受伤
nodes.support_text: 74 passengers and crew of the plane were evacuated after the plane made a safe landing.

nodes.description: 航空官员确认飞机在升空后不久被迫降落
nodes.support_text: The plane... was forced to land minutes after taking off from the Mogadishu airport, said Mohamoud.

nodes.description: 联合国驻索马里副大使通过社交媒体描述听到巨响和烟雾
nodes.support_text: Awale Kullane... heard a loud noise and couldn't see anything but smoke for a few seconds.

nodes.description: 航空安全专家通过机身照片排除压力爆炸可能性，确认爆炸装置特征
nodes.support_text: Goglia said there are only two things that could have caused a hole in the plane that looks like the one in photos circulated online — a bomb or a pressurization blowout caused by a flaw or fatigue in the plane's skin.

nodes.description: 乘客听到内部爆炸声并目击火焰撕裂机身侧面
nodes.support_text: Mohamed Ali... heard a bang inside the plane before flames opened a gaping hole in the plane's side.

nodes.description: 乘客拍摄氧气面罩使用视频并上传社交媒体
nodes.support_text: Passengers also posted a video showing some passengers putting on oxygen masks inside the plane.
Belgrade daily Blic引用Vladimir Vodopivec的话
